entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cold Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:33 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Pellets, -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Cold Lake 4:46 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Ice Pellets
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow changing to snow and ending this evening then cloudy. Fog patches developing late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
